yang.weiwei.lda.rtm.lex_wsb_rtm

Class LexWSBRTM

  • java.lang.Object
    • yang.weiwei.lda.LDA
      • yang.weiwei.lda.rtm.RTM
        • yang.weiwei.lda.rtm.lex_wsb_rtm.LexWSBRTM
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    LexWSBMedRTM

    public class LexWSBRTM
extends RTM
    RTM with lexical weights and weighted stochastic block priors
    Author:
    Weiwei Yang
